mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USER_EMAIL) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT PLAN_NO as planNo, USER_NO as "user.userNo", PLAN_TITLE as planTitle, DATE as date, PLAN_CONTENT as planContent FROM PLAN WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
